body_html:
I meant this NotImplementedError: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/variables.py#L2400

If we can replace this error with an implementation of assign, assign_add, etc for PartitionedVariable this will be more 2.0-friendly.
body_text:
I meant this NotImplementedError: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/variables.py#L2400
If we can replace this error with an implementation of assign, assign_add, etc for PartitionedVariable this will be more 2.0-friendly.
body:
I meant this NotImplementedError: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/variables.py#L2400

If we can replace this error with an implementation of assign, assign_add, etc for PartitionedVariable this will be more 2.0-friendly.
